data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ramos-Tafur, Gabriel E., Lemaitre, Rafael (2017): A new species of shrimp of the genus Periclimenaeus Borradaile, 1915 (Decapoda: Caridea: Palaemonidae) from the southeastern Gulf of Mexico, including a key to the western Atlantic species of the genus. Zootaxa 4303 (4): 491-508, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4303.4.3|23 occurrences
